posts.post_content:
As already mentioned, he is legendary, so you can only have 1 at the table at any one time. If you want -+1/+1 X 4 for black, consider [Ashenmoor liege](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashenmoor liege), if you have a lot of "bring back from graveyard" cards.
  
This is a nice creature, though he doesn't look very flying from the graphic.

This is a nice creature, though he doesn't look very flying from the graphic.
